docs.text: dvc-project-template DVC project template STEPS - STEP 01- Create a repository by using template repository STEP 02- Clone the new repository STEP 03- Create a conda environment after opening the repository in VSCODE conda create --prefix ./env python = 3 .7 -y conda activate ./env OR source activate ./env STEP 04- install the requirements pip install -r requirements.txt STEP 05- initialize the dvc project dvc init STEP 06- commit and push the changes to the remote repository
docs.title: Home

docs.text: conda create --prefix ./env python = 3 .7 -y conda activate ./env OR source activate ./env

docs.text: Data Preparation stage Convert my data into train and test.tsv in 70:30 ratio data.xml |-train.tsv |-test.tsv We are choosing only three tags in the xml data - 1. row Id, 2. title and body 3. Tags (Stackoverflow Tags specific to python) Tags feature names row Id row ID title and body text stackoverflow tags Label - Python

docs.text: Featurization stage in progress Step 01- create train and test data path and relevanr directories as needed Step 02- create a dataframe from the train data Step 03- Apply Bag of words Step 04- Apply TFIDF Step 05- Apply same steps for test data but without the fit method Step 06- Save the data in form of pkl object
